import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartContext from "../../utils/CartContext" function IndividualCoffee({ addToCart }) { const {item, quantity, price} = useContext(CartContext); console.log(`item is : ${item} and quantity is ${quantity}`) const [bagQuantity, setBagQuantity] = useState(0) const [coffeeItem, setCoffeeItem] = useState("12 oz mexican bean") const [itemPrice, setPrice] = useState(0) const handleIncrement = () => { setBagQuantity(bagQuantity + 1) } const handleDecrement = () => { if(bagQuantity >0) { setBagQuantity(bagQuantity -1) } } const mexicanBeanPrice = 12.99 return ( <>

) } export default IndividualCoffee;
